page.title: 15STATES ELECTRICITY BOARD
page.content: {The power station}employs 250 people. It produces 11,000 volts in the control room there are lots of phones. There is a special phone,normal phone, emergency phone and an internal phone. There is a map of Guernsey that shows all the sub stations .In the generating hall there are{six big {generators}and one small generator. Some of the big generators are called turbine or jet engines .To show the different coloured pipes, brown shows fuel oil, yellow shows lubricating oil,blue shows internal cooling water and green shows raw water .The water that looks like steam is really water vapour from the gas solid collectors. There is a cooling tower that cools the pipes with the electricity in them.The big{chimneys are 60 metres tall.The power station has been going since 1899.
